abstract: David Pogue offers an updated list of online acronyms.
snippet: David Pogue offers an updated list of online acronyms.
lead_paragraph: By now, everybody, I hope, knows what LOL stands for. Most people probably recognize IMHO, BRB, and AFK. (If you don't know these, you can always Google* them.)

headline.main: The Next Generation of Online Shorthand
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
